overview: These are fearful times. As filmmakers, we wanted to bring laughter to people's lives the only way we know how, through filmmaking. We got together and made a short film about the Coronavirus pandemic and the ridiculous people who seek to benefit from it. Shot on the Blackmagic Pocket 6k with Sigma lenses. Enjoy the film!
tagline: "For the world, the Coronavirus means fear and uncertainty. For two opportunists, it means the score of a lifetime."
title: Coronavirus Cowboys
